episodes.title: The Most Sadistic Cult in American History
episodes.description:
In 1981, a seemingly ordinary group of men in Chicago concealed a darkness that would shock the city. Bound by twisted beliefs and unrelenting cruelty, their actions left behind a trail of fear, grief, and unanswered questions that still linger today.

NEW VIDEOS Every Second Tuesday @ 7PM EST

Main Channel:
► https://www.youtube.com/@LetsReadPodcast  
► Patreon (Early Access): https://www.patreon.com/letsread 

Listen to the Podcast:
► Spotify: https://spoti.fi/2o7wgnc
► Apple Podcasts: https://apple.co/2Mwumv6


Follow Me:
► https://www.instagram.com/letsread.official/


Production: https://www.youtube.com/@inekt & https://www.instagram.com/nicolebrgr
Written by: https://samridingwrites.substack.com/


This channel is dedicated to exploring the darkest corners of true crime and the most fascinating, untold moments in history. From chilling unsolved mysteries and infamous criminal cases to forgotten historical events and conspiracies buried by time, Saturn Soul dives deep into stories that shock, disturb, and captivate.

Here, you’ll uncover True Crime Stories about serial killers, cold cases, cults, disappearances, and high-profile investigations — alongside Historical Documentaries about lost civilizations, cover-ups, forbidden archaeology, and world-changing events that history books overlook.

If you're a fan of creators like Wendigoon, Barely Sociable, Matt Orchard, Dark Docs, or Coffeehouse Crime, & Mr. Ballen, Saturn Soul is for you.
